text:
e="preserve">The Right Honourable Sir Edward Zacca, KCMG, OJ, PC (26 July 1931 – 11 November 2019) was a Jamaican politician. He was Chief Justice of the Jamaican Supreme Court from 1985 to 1996. He served as acting Governor-General. Zacca served in that capacity from March to August 1991. He served as President of the Court of Appeal of the Bahamas from March 2000 to July 2001.
Zacca was a member of the Order of Jamaica. He died on 11 November 2019 at the age of 88.

annotations.surface_form: President of the Court of Appeal of the Bahamas
